main event: Multiple UFO sightings reported over Medina, New York in August 1962.
interesting points: The sightings occurred during periods of rainfall, suggesting a connection with the weather conditions., Various witnesses described the objects moving slowly and making abrupt changes in direction., A letter was sent to the U.S. Air Force enclosing pieces of material believed to have fallen with the UFOs., One witness described a lighted object making a humming sound, adding to the mystery of the sightings., There are references to official investigations and documentation under Project Blue Book.
sighted object: Unidentified aerial objects, described as round and luminous
witness description: One male witness was 34 years old, employed in general utility work; the other was 23 years old and worked as a laborer.
